title: Cole 13's Writing Hut
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar]]
[[module CSS]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Amatic+SC&display=swap');

/*
    Powered on 2021/04/01 17:01:07
    [2021 Wikidot Theme]
    Created by Cole 13
    CC BY-SA 3.0
*/



body {
    background: #FAF1CF;
    color: #000000;
}
a,a:visited {
    color: #3F6844;
}
h1 {
    color: #3F6844;
}
blockquote {
    border-style: 1px #000000;
    background: #beddc2;
   
    
}
div#container-wrap {
    background: url(http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/cole-author-page/HH3) top left repeat-x;
}
div#header {
    background-image: url('http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/cole-author-page/cole');
    background-size: 7.5rem;
    background-position: 3px 29px;
}
div#header h1 a span {
    font-size: 0px;
}
div#header h1 a:before {
    content: "Cole 13's Writing Hut ";
    color: #FAF1CF;
    text-shadow: text-shadow: #000000 2px 5px;;
    font-family: 'Amatic SC', cursive;
}
.ticker {
    background-color: #272727;
    white-space: nowrap;
    overflow: hidden;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 4px grey solid;
   position: sticky;
   top: 0;
   text-align: center;  
   z-index: 1;
}
div#header h2 span {
    font-size:0px;
    padding: 4px;
}
div#header h2:after {
    content: "Take a look, would ya? ";
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #FAF1CF;
    padding: 19px 0;
    text-shadow: text-shadow: #000000 2px 5px;;
    white-space: pre;
    font-family: 'Amatic SC', cursive;
}
#top-bar a {
    color: black;
    font-weight: bold;   
}
div#side-bar div.side-block {
    background: white;
    border: 1px solid #000000;;
}
div#side-bar div.side-block div.heading,
div#side-bar div.collapsible-block-unfolded-link,
div#side-bar div.collapsible-block-unfolded-link div.collapsible-block-link {
    color: #000000;
    border-color: black;
}

div.yui-navset div.yui-content {
    background: #5DAA68;
}
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav a,
div.yui-navset div.yui-navset-top ul.yui-nav a {
    background: #5DAA68;
    color: #FAF1CF;
    border: solid #000000;;
}
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav a:hover,
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav a:focus {
    background: #3F6844;
    color: #FAF1CF;
}
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav .selected a,
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav .selected a:focus,
div.yui-navset ul.yui-nav .selected a:hover {
    background: #3F6844;
    color: #FAF1CF;
    border: solid #000000;
}
div.page-rate-widget-box,
div.page-rate-widget-box span.rate-points,
div.page-rate-widget-box span.cancel {
    background-color: #FAF1CF!important;
    border: solid #FAF1CF 1px!important;
}
div.page-rate-widget-box span.rateup,
div.page-rate-widget-box span.ratedown {
    border: solid #FAF1CF!important;
    border-width: 1px 0!important;
}
div.page-rate-widget-box span.rate-points,
div.page-rate-widget-box span.cancel a,
div.page-rate-widget-box span.cancel a:hover {
    color: #000000;
}
div.page-rate-widget-box span.rateup,
div.page-rate-widget-box span.ratedown {
    background-color: #FAF1CF!important;
}
div.page-rate-widget-box span.rateup a,
div.page-rate-widget-box span.ratedown a {
    color: #000000!important;
}
div.page-rate-widget-box span.cancel a:hover,
div.page-rate-widget-box span.rateup a:hover,
div.page-rate-widget-box span.ratedown a:hover {
    background: transparent!important;
    color: transparent!important;
}
div.open-menu a {
    color: transparent!important;
    border-color: #FAF1CF!important;
}

[[/module]]

[[>]]
**ADMISSION FEE: ONE (1) UPVOTE**
[[/>]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

@@ @@ 
[[module ListPages name="7000contestcoletopmetal"]]
++++ - [*http://www.scp-wiki.wikidot.com/7000contestcoletopmetal SCP-7XXX]  - The Long Winding Road - [+%%rating%%] -
@@ @@ 
[[size x-small]]COLLABORATION BETWEEN: [[*user cole 13]], [[*user metalravioli]] and [[*user topdownunder]][[/size]]
@@ @@ 
//"SCP-7000 demonstrates the anomalous property to manifest objects that prove useful in their current situation."//

[[size 3.5em]]WHAT DO THESE PEOPLE [[/size]]
@@ @@
[[size 3.5em]]THINK? [[/size]]
[[/=]]
@@ @@
> 
> [[=]]
> “Your so cool your still on team Whitney even tho I didnt post” 
> [[/=]]
>
[[>]]
-[[*user Dr Whitney]]
[[/>]]
@@ @@
> 
> [[=]]
> “güd person, write many word” 
> [[/=]]
>
[[>]]
-[[*user basirskipreader]]
[[/>]]

@@ @@
> 
> [[=]]
> “Who's the author again? Cole. Cole's a jerk.” 
> [[/=]]
>
[[>]]
-[[*user Dr.Leonerd]]
[[/>]]

@@ @@
> 
> [[=]]
> “i paid for the drawing hut, what is this place? i wanted artwork, not words!” 
> [[/=]]
>
[[>]]
-[[*user topdownunder]]
[[/>]]
@@ @@
> 
> [[=]]
> “13 indeed” 
> [[/=]]
>
[[>]]
-[[*user GremlinGroup]]
[[/>]]
@@ @@
> 
> [[=]]
> “Cole 13 is the most yeah” 
> [[/=]]
>
[[>]]
-[[*user Calibold]]
[[/>]]
@@ @@
> 
> [[=]]
> “Out of all of the authors on site, Cole 13 is one of them” 
> [[/=]]
>
[[>]]
-[[*user Limeyy]]
[[/>]]
@@ @@
> 
> [[=]]
> “Hm, Cole 13? Yeah! He's my favorite author! Now, where is that 5 bucks?” 
> [[/=]]
>
[[>]]
- Some random person off the street
[[/>]]
@@ @@
>
> [[=]]
> “13 indeed”
> [[/=]]
>
[[>]]
- [[*user azamo ]]
[[/>]]
@@ @@
>
> [[=]]
> “Sir this is a Wendy's”
> [[/=]]
>
[[>]]
- Wendy's worker
[[/>]]
@@ @@

> [[=]]
> “ "yea**h** col**e** is honest**l**y a **p**retty great author, **m**aybe **e**ven the best on the site”
> [[/=]]
>
[[>]]
- [[*user Moremuffins]]
[[/>]]
@@ @@
>
> [[=]]
> “of all the things i can say about cole, this is one of them.”
> [[/=]]
>
[[>]]
- [[*user ROUNDERHOUSE ]]
[[/>]]
@@ @@
>
> [[=]]
> “Cole”
> [[/=]]
>
[[>]]
- [[*user Gekkoguy ]]
[[/>]]
@@ @@
>
> [[=]]
> “cole 13”
> [[/=]]
>
[[>]]
- [[*user yossipossi ]]
[[/>]]
@@ @@ 
>
> [[=]]
> “love him or hate him- he's definitely Cole 13”
> [[/=]]
>
[[>]]
- [[*user Elunerazim ]]
[[/>]]
@@ @@ 
>
> [[=]]
> “The next time you do this the thumbs down goes on your 6k”
> [[/=]]
>
[[>]]
- [[*user Harryblank ]]
[[/>]]
@@ @@ 
>
> [[=]]
> “Bababooey”
> [[/=]]
>
[[>]]
- [[*user PlaguePJP ]]
[[/>]]
@@ @@ 
>
> [[=]]
> “yes”
> [[/=]]
>
[[>]]
- [[*user Ralliston ]]
[[/>]]
@@ @@ 
>
> [[=]]
> “Cole is my favorite SCP author, go upvote his articles.”
> [[/=]]
>
[[>]]
- Markiplier 
[[/>]]
@@ @@
>
> [[=]]
> “Cole is a person that exists?”
> [[/=]]
>
[[>]]
- [[*user totallynotenby ]]
[[/>]]
[[/collapsible]]
@@ @@ 
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
--------------------------------
@@ @@
@@ @@ 
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
> 
> Hello! I am [[*user Cole 13]]! I've made articles! During the pandemic, I have discovered SCPs and wanted to write them ever since! Needless to say, I've learned a ton just by joining this website. Perhaps, this is one of the best things to happen for me! I have to thank my collaborators and my critters, and the people who supported me and my efforts. 
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@ 
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

[[size 150%]]SCPs[[/size]]
@@ @@
[[module ListPages name="scp-6015"]]
++++ - [*http://www.scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6015 SCP-6015]  - Nature's Stance - [+%%rating%%] -

[[size smaller]]6K CON[[/size]]

[[size x-small]]COLLABORATION BETWEEN:[[*user Rose the Changeling]] and [[*user Cole 13]][[/size]]

//"**SCP-6015:** That is a question you're going to have to figure out yourselves. I've only come here to provide an offer that may help you with your goal and it's up to you if you wish to accept it or not. I'll give you a week to think about it, but don't hesitate to come back to me when you've made your decision."//

[[/module]]

@@ @@

[[module ListPages name="scp-6170"]]
++++ - [*http://www.scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6170 SCP-6170]  - A Tale Of a God, and The Chaos Surrounding His Demise - [+%%rating%%] - 

[[size smaller]]MEMECON[[/size]]

[[size x-small]]COLLABORATION BETWEEN: [[*user topdownunder]] and [[*user Cole 13]][[/size]]

//"SCP-6170 refers to a sentient entity that, until an incident in mid-2016, existed within ██████████, Ohio. SCP-6170 demonstrated stabilizing effects on anomalous phenomena, not just in its general vicinity but throughout reality. Objects with anomalous traits brought close to SCP-6170 would have these properties diminished, or in some cases, outright nullified."//

[[/module]]

@@ @@

[[module ListPages name="scp-6807"]]
++++ - [*http://www.scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6807 SCP-6807]  - Shepard Tone - [+%%rating%%] -
[[size x-small]]COLLABORATION BETWEEN: [[*user Elenee FishTruck]], [[*user GremlinGroup]], [[*user JakdragonX]] and [[*user Cole 13]] [[/size]]

//"SCP-6807 is a red-carpeted staircase, accessed from an unmarked door in Kyoto's sewers. The staircase does not breach the surface, despite extending far beyond the requisite length to do so. Paintings hang from the brick walls at regular intervals."//

[[/module]]

@@ @@

[[module ListPages name="scp-6447"]]
++++ - [*http://www.scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6447 SCP-6447]  - Symphony of the Wronged - [+%%rating%%] - 
[[size x-small]]COLLABORATION BETWEEN:  [[*user Lt Flops]], [[*user LORDXVNV]], [[*user Aftokrator]], [[*user Elunerazim]], [[*user Jack Waltz]], [[*user GreenGolem]], [[*user Cole 13]], [[*user MetalRavioli]] and [[*user MoreMuffins]] [[/size]]

//"The collective of SCP-6447 is instinctively identified as 328 human beings and constantly plays a selection from Vivaldi's The Four Seasons, corresponding with the season of the antipode of Bear Mountain, New York. "//

[[/module]]

@@ @@


[[module ListPages name="scp-6114"]]
++++ - [*http://www.scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6114 SCP-6114]  - Returning to Our Roots - [+%%rating%%] - 

//"SCP-6114 is a ritual that will revive any deity, but only at a fraction of its original stature. "//

[[/module]]


@@ @@ 

[[module ListPages name="scp-5747"]]
++++ - [*http://www.scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5747 SCP-5747]  - Three Titans - [+%%rating%%] - 

//"This is my gift for [[*user topdownunder]]!"//

[[/module]]

++++ - [*http://www.scp-wiki.wikidot.com/vikander-kneed-worldwide-news-network Vikander-Kneed Worldwide News Network]  - [+%%rating%%] -

[[/module]]
@@ @@

//"This is the Writing anomalies theme by [[*user Cole 13]].  It is a derivative Sigma-9 theme. I would recommend using this for mundane, neutralized, or safe SCPs!"//

This was my first thing to hold a positive rating, ever! I spent months on this.

[[module ListPages fullname="extended-scp-6170-event-log"]]
++++ - [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/extended-scp-6170-event-log SCP-6170-A Event Logs]  - [+%%rating%%] -
[[size x-small]]COLLABORATION BETWEEN: [[*user topdownunder]] and [[*user Cole 13]][[/size]]

//"Welcome. The world has gone to shit since SCP-6170 died. Anomalies from all over the world have changed, and have completely gone backwards on their anomalous pattern. Your job, find and log the rest, so we can avoid some of these fuckers. Good luck. - Dr. Cole Thereven"//


[[/module]]

**Birthdate:** Milwaukee, Wisconsin July 17th, 1976.
